title: Salem Fire & EMS Department
description:
The Salem Fire & EMS Department is located in Salem, VA. This collection demonstrates the history of the professionalization and modernization of the Salem Fire Department, as it transformed from a voluntary service (1854) to a professional service at the turn of the 19th century. 
This collection contains handwritten documents recording foundation and modernization of Salem fire department and incidents they responded to.
subject: Fire departments|| Virginia
